data.data: Initial comments:This report is the result of a State licensure survey conducted on May 10, 2023, at Riddle Surgical Center, LLC.  It was determined the facility was in compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Ambulatory Care Facilities, Annex A, Title 28, Part IV, Subparts A and F, Chapters 551-573, November 1999.  Plan of Correction: Initial comments:This report is the result of a State licensure survey conducted on May 10, 2023, at Riddle Surgical Center, LLC.  It was determined the facility was in compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Ambulatory Care Facilities, Annex A, Title 28, Part IV, Subparts A and F, Chapters 551-573, November 1999.  Plan of Correction:
